#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include<string.h>
 
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int d ,i,k;
	char n[10000];
	char a[2]="";
	std::vector<string> v(10);
	v.at(0)="";
	v.at(1)="pa";
	v.at(2)="re";
	v.at(3)="ci";
	v.at(4)="vo";
	v.at(5)="mk";
	v.at(6)="x";
	v.at(7) ="zi";
	v.at(8)="bi";
	v.at(9)="so";
	
	scanf("%s",&n);
	
	for(i=0;n[i]!='\0';i++)
{
	
	k=n[i]-'0';
//	a=v(k);
	std::cout<<v[k];
}	
	
	
	return 0;
	
	
}
